page.title: 17HEAMOOR C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: The main building was built in{1901. The school is under the Madron School Board because Madron was bigger than Heamoor then.Heamoor is a village 1km North West of Penzance. Heamoor School has had three headmasters.The present headmaster,Mr.Richards,has been Head for 21 years.During the year the school has an Open Day,Christmas Play,Spring Show,Harvest Festival and a field trip.The school has teams for swimming,Towerball,Netball,Football and Rounders.The colours for Sports Day are Red,Yellow,Green and Blue. The school buildings include the main {granite}building,five temporary Elliot "huts" and part of the original school in the village.We play in the field and around the main building. The school has 250 children and 17 members of staff including teachers and helpers. Hea.
